attributes.long-description:
You are double agent Sam Fisher, caught in a menacing conspiracy. Immerse yourself in the world of international espionage and discover the entire Splinter Cell series through flashbacks and exclusive new missions.

- Exclusive PSP® missions and awesome stealth moves.
- International locations span the entire Splinter Cell series.
- Single-player and multiplayer Spy vs. Spy game play.

PLEASE NOTE: Due to media differences, the digital and UMD disc versions of this title are incompatible with each other in Multiplayer mode.

attributes.name: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell® Essentials
